front.title: Proceedings of the NIST Centennial Standards Symposium

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: On Mar. 7, 2001, in honor of its 100th anniversary, the National Institute of Standards and Technology sponsored the NIST Centennial Standards Symposium.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
